News and developments from Justia and the tech world -----

Your Quarterly Notes From Justia Elevate 

Welcome to your quarterly updates from Justia Elevate, our customized platform designed to create websites that work for lawyers.

Be sure to check out this email for information on recent updates we’ve made to the Justia Elevate platform, new design and feature options available for your site, and the latest informative guides from the Justia Elevate Help Center and Knowledge Base.

Announcements

New Justia AI Writer Feature

In addition to drafting pages with Justia AI Writer, you may now generate freeform content for any page on your site according to your own custom instructions. On the Elevate platform, edit any existing page or create a new page, click the + icon to add a new block to the page content and select Justia AI Writer. Enter your prompt and you're off to the races!

Click here for a how-to on how to add this block to a page.

Need help with creating the prompt? View our help article here.

What's New in Design

New design options are now available for your website's Client Reviews stripe. If you'd like to refresh the look and feel of this stripe, it's easy! Just click here to view your options and get started.

You can now include a stripe displaying the payment methods your firm accepts and can link to your payment site if applicable. You'll find the option under Stripes > Add Stripe > Basic.

Justia Elevate Platform Updates

Justia Elevate Platform Updates

The Justia Elevate platform was recently updated to incorporate upgrades that improve your site’s pages and structured data, and enhance the overall Justia Elevate platform user experience. Additionally, you now have the ability to easily reorder your pages, and incorporate videos from additional video providers in the video stripes.

Your Premium Yoast SEO Was Updated

Your Yoast SEO plugin was upgraded to the latest and greatest! This new version includes SEO analysis improvements, background indexing, better tracking of your cornerstone content, and a new readability asessment.

Yoast SEO Premium Redirects Tool

Justia Elevate now includes an enhanced version of the Yoast SEO Redirect Manager. This upgraded plugin offers improvements that help avoid redirect loops and redirect chains in key scenarios.

Justia Elevate Help Center Updates

Check out the Justia Elevate Help Center to see these new and updated articles, as well as our other resources to help you continuously maximize your Justia Elevate website’s potential!
